course_description: I will introduce basic graph-theoretical concepts, graphs, trees, networks, cycles, independence number, chromatic number, planarity and genus, paths and cycles, etc. I will emphasize "extremal" problems and counting techniques.
schedule_location: MW 8:30am-9:45am in Math & Science Center - W303
sections: Class Nbr: 6038, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: C. Pohoata, Status: Open
